DOC.criteria: Women gestational age > 36 week , parity 0 Gestational age < 36 week Signs fetal pathology : Different abnormal ( pathological ) CTG test perform start test Abnormal Doppler registration ( PI arteria umbilicae > 2SD gestational age ) Established notch arteria uterinae notch bilaterally PI > 2SD > 24 week Diverging weight fetus > 22 % diverge growth fetus 10 % , establish structural pathology fetus , oligohydramnion ( amniotic fluid index < 6 ) Maternal diseases pregnancy complication diabetes pregnancy high blood pressure cardiovascular disease rheumatic disease epilepsia lung disease , etc . CTG test : cardiotocographic test ( measure fetal activity ) PI : pulsatory index ( velocity pattern ) SD : standard deviation
